Change dressing.sentence: The nurse gathers all necessary supplies for the dressing change.
Change dressing.subject: The nurse
Change dressing.object: all necessary supplies for the dressing change
Change dressing.tools: dressing supplies, gloves, antiseptic solution, scissors

Change dressing.sentence: The nurse washes her hands thoroughly to ensure cleanliness.
Change dressing.subject: The nurse

Change dressing.sentence: The nurse puts on sterile gloves to maintain a sterile environment.
Change dressing.subject: The nurse

Change dressing.sentence: The nurse carefully removes the old dressing and inspects the wound for any signs of infection.
Change dressing.subject: The nurse
Change dressing.object: the old dressing and inspects the wound

Change dressing.sentence: The nurse applies a new dressing securely over the wound to promote healing.
Change dressing.subject: The nurse
Change dressing.object: a new dressing securely over the wound
